str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From eklegomai; select; by implication, favorite.
A sister, a woman (fellow-)member of a church, a Christian woman. Fem of adephos; a sister.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To greet, salute, pay my respects to, welcome. To enfold in the arms, i.e. to salute, to welcome.
